divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the house and my friend brian came over yelling for me to come look at this object he couldnt identify. i ra n outside and saw a glowing object near the horizon. then we noticed about 5 airplanes in the vicinity . the object slowly moved away seemingly to disappear. we both felt as if we trully experienceed something special. after it was gone we felt we had to report this.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Greensburg
There were no other sightings in Greensburg on or around November 25th 2011
Summary: bright glowing object slowly moved away seemingly to disappear
